title: Chili Crisp Vinaigrette Cabbage
source: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
categories: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
ingredients: - ¼ cup / 60ml Chili Crisp Vinaigrette (this page)
- 1 lb / 450g cabbage, cut into bite-size wedges
directions: 1. In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch and chili vinaigrette together. Set aside.

2. In a wok over high heat, warm the oil until almost smoking. Add the Sichuan pepper and chili peppers and stir-fry quickly for 30 seconds to release their fragrance. Add the garlic and ginger and stir-fry for another 30 seconds.

3. Add the cabbage and stir-fry for 2 to 3 minutes, until the leaves start to soften. Then add the vinaigrette mixture and continue to stir for about 1 minute, until the sauce has thickened. Remove the wok from the heat, transfer the cabbage and sauce to a serving dish, and serve hot.
